contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} Three ships in the [[United States Navy]] have been named '''USS ''Jouett''''' for [[James Edward Jouett]]. *{{USS|Jouett|DD-41}} was a [[Paulding class destroyer|''Paulding''-class]] [[destroyer]] launched in 1912, served in World War I, served in the United States Coast Guard from 1924 to 1930 and sold in 1934 *{{USS|Jouett|DD-396}} was a [[Somers class destroyer|''Somers''-class]] destroyer launched in 1938, served in World War II and decommissioned in 1945 *{{USS|Jouett|DLG-29}} was a [[Belknap class cruiser|''Belknap''-class]] guided missile [[cruiser]] launched in 1964 and decommissioned in 1994 {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Jouett, Uss}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]]
